name.value: FHIR Connectathon 15 - Provider Directory - Scenario 6 - Organizational Relationships - JSON

description.value: PractitionerRole search by Organizational relationships capabilities tests; resource format JSON; validate telecom and endpoint; Endpoint resource expected to be contained in PractitionerRole; test a FHIR server's Practitioner search operation support using the parameter: organization (reference), organization.address and organization.name. Default values for the search parameters are based on the PractitionerRole and Organization Resource Examples and can be modified to allow testing against other known resource instances.
PractitionerRole read and search operations; search by chained parameters
Search PractitionerRole using the organization (reference) search parameter with the provided organization reference value.
Search for PractitionerRole matches using the organization (reference) search parameter.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned format is JSON.
Confirm that the returned resource type is Bundle.

Confirm that there are at least two records returned - a PractitionerRole and included Endpoint. Although not expected, there could be other PractitionerRole and Endpoint records returned. Warning only to allow for Endpoint to be contained in the PractitionerRole.
Confirm that the Bundle total value matches or is greater than the number of entries in the Bundle.

Confirm that there are PractitionerRole and included Endpoint returned resources. Although not expected, there could be other PractitionerRole and Endpoint records returned. Warning only to allow for Endpoint to be contained in the PractitionerRole.

expression.value: Bundle.entry.select(resource as PractitionerRole).exists() and Bundle.entry.select(resource as Endpoint).exists()
